name: Spikes Of Death!
description:
Spikes Of Death is a pointy endless runner set in a pixelated, midnight city!

Dodge the spikes barrelling towards you whilst enjoying the skyline of the city!

Note: 

I’m a new game dev, ok. This is my second game. Any feedback, positive or negative, would be awesome. I hope you find my game enjoyable and unique(probably not)!

:/

:)
